page.title: 08Games in Clayton-le-Woods: 1
page.content: {Line Tig:}A game for five or more players. We use the painted lines on the playground. To start the players pick someone to be 'on' who goes to the middle of the pitch, counts to ten whilst turning around and then begins to chase the other players. They must run on the lines, if they do not they become 'on'. When a player is touched by the person who is 'on', even if he is on a line, he becomes 'on' and the game starts again. { Mud Man:}A game for ten or more players. We use two painted circles on the playground as dens where you are safe and a dark patch as the mud pot. One person is chosen to be Mud Man and starts in the mud pot. The players run from one den to the other trying to avoid being caught by the Mud Man. If you are caught and taken to the mud pot you become the new Mud Man.
